stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 2 tags.
text:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 2 tags.
title: Forced Connection
